'''v0.7.1 alpha''' is a minor update to'' [[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' that was released on June 7, 2013 to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.7.0 alpha|v0.7.0]].

== Changes ==

*The logo appears to have an updated look on the title screen.

'''Other'''
* Cows can be milked in creative, but an empty bucket will not appear.
* Fixed losing milk buckets when crafting cake.
* Fixed not being able to obtain water with buckets in split-touch controls.
* Fixed opening another available world when creating a new world while scrolling.</onlyinclude>
